title: Justine Greening – 2016 Speech on the EU Referendum
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Justine Greening, the Secretary of State for International Development, at the London Business School on 29 April 2016.

[![justinegreening](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/justinegreening.jpg)](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/justinegreening.jpg)
